Posted By: OmegaSerris (7/26/2011 12:02:16 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Goblin Snowman costs four mana, [Baneslayer Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Baneslayer Angel) costs five.  
Gobiln Snowman is a Goblin, and so it has a tribal component, [Tarmogoyf](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tarmogoyf) has not.  
Goblin Snowman prevents all combat damage, [Vampire Nighthawk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vampire Nighthawk) doesn't.  
Goblin Snowman can deal direct damage, [Jace](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=195297) can't.  
Goblin Snowman is 1/1, [Ali From Cairo](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=957) is 0/1 for the same CMC.  
  
So... Every part of Goblin Snowman is STRICTLY BETTER than that of one of the most powerful cards in Magic. And I haven't talked about the artwork...
